to share tech about this character on Twitter

column12: f,f+3 ⏵ RDS d+3,4 ⏵ ub+3 ⏵ AOP uf,n,3 ⏵ (dash) df+2,1+2

column2:
HYP stance moves are enhanced.
Gains access to f+2,1,2 and f,f+1,2
column7:
A safe mid heat engager that creates space on block. 
 Can be used to fish for a heat activation and also to setup 
 space traps.
Mostly useful in block or whiff punish situations.
column12:
AOP 1 ⏵ ws+2 ⏵ RDS 1,2 T! ⏵ (ub+1+2) HYP 3+4 ⏵
(dash) df+2,1+2

column7: Safe mid option during HYP stance.

Useful for whiff punishing after evading attacks using your
 AOP stance.

Heat engage from her backturned stance. It's safe on block 
 but the second hit is a high.

column11: for a more complete combo list, I recommend THIS video.

column12: f,f+3 ⏵ RDS d+3,4 ⏵ ub+3 ⏵ AOP uf,n,3 ⏵ (dash) df+2,1+2

column7:
Quick jab to check situations and start your offense.
 1,d+2 is an excellent extension for poking and to transition 
 to RDS to create situations.
column12:
f,f+3 ⏵ RDS d+3,4 ⏵ (dash) ub+3 ⏵ AOP uf,n,3 ⏵ 
(dash) df+2,1+2

column7:
A high crushing mid poke to harass the opponent.
 It shifts to RDS or HYP by holding back. You can also hold
 forward to cancel stance transitions.

column12:
ws+2~B (hold) ⏵ f+3,1 ⏵ RDS 1,2 T! ⏵ (ub+1+2) HYP 3+4 ⏵
(dash) df+2,1+2

column7:
Counterhitting launching low with good range. Use it at
 the midrange to stuff their keepout or approach.
Quick low poke that shifts to RDS.

Homing high attack to catch opponents sidestepping 
 your approach and some of your okizeme situations. It gives 
 guaranteed follow-ups on hit.
column12:
AOP uf,n,4 ⏵ f+2 ⏵ f+3,1 ⏵ RDS 1,2 T! ⏵ 
(ub+1+2) HYP 3+4 ⏵ f,f+4 ⏵ HYP 2

RDS f+3+4,3+4 ⏵ RDS d+3,4 ⏵ (dash) ub+3 T! ⏵ AOP uf,n,3 ⏵
(dash) df+2,1+2

column7:
High attack to initiate your HYP stance offense. Launches
 on counterhit.

A short ranged homing mid that shifts to RDS. It has a low
 extension that can be used to discourage opponents from 
 retaliating on block.

Ling's approach tool that shifts to AOP. It launches on 
 normal hit and leave you at an advantage when blocked.

A highly evasive stance you can create setups around. 
 Use the pushback of certain moves such as db+1 or 1,2,1
 to go into AOP and create whiffs. 
 Learn other creatives ways to use and limit your opponents
 effective movelist against you.
STANDING

column12: ub+4 ⏵ heat on f+2,1,2 ⏵ RDS f+3+4,3+4

column7: b+4,1 (heat)
column12:
After tornado, follow with (ub+1+2) HYP 3+4
then (run) f+2 and follow with a Heat Burst to extend your
combo.

column7:
3
df+2,3 (wallsplat)

column12:
You can use df+2,3 to carry from mid distances or f+2
for short ones.

column7: uf+3
ub+3
column12: Use 3+4 for floor breaks and f+1+2 to break walls.
